attributes.action: Remove the powers of Scottish, Welsh & NI MPs when voting on English matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English MPs cannot vote in the regional assemblies on matters affecting these countries. Therefore, the representatives from Scottland, Wales & NI should not be asked to vote on PURE English matters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
